<small>Also see: **<big>[[H0274|אֲחַזְיָה]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַזְיָ֫הוּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַזְיָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחְזַי‎</span> **proper name, masculine** (***Yah(u) hath grasped***; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ὀχοζ</span>(<span class="bdbLangGreek">ε</span>)<span class="bdbLangGreek">ιας</span> [[1Kgs.22.52|1Kgs 22:52]] etc., compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 53</sup>) **\*\***compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> VIII, + <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = ***adopt***, hence perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***hath adopted***. 

**1.** king of Israel, son of Ahab [[1Kgs.22.40|1Kgs 22:40]]; [[1Kgs.22.50|1Kgs 22:50]]; [[1Kgs.22.52|1Kgs 22:52]]; [[2Kgs.1.18|2Kgs 1:18]]; [[2Chr.20.37|2Chr 20:37]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַזְיָהוּ‎</span>); + [[2Kgs.1.2|2Kgs 1:2]]; [[2Chr.20.35|2Chr 20:35]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַזְיָה‎</span>). 

**2.** king of Judah, son of Joram [[2Kgs.8.24|2Kgs 8:24]]; [[2Kgs.8.25|2Kgs 8:25]]; [[2Kgs.9.21|2Kgs 9:21]]; [[2Kgs.10.13|2Kgs 10:13]]; [[2Kgs.11.1|2Kgs 11:1]]; [[2Kgs.12.19|2Kgs 12:19]]; [[2Kgs.13.1|2Kgs 13:1]]; [[2Kgs.14.13|2Kgs 14:13]]; [[2Kgs.1.11|2Kgs 1:11]]; [[2Kgs.22.1|2Kgs 22:1]] + 15 t. 2 Kings, 1 Chronicles (all <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַזְיָהוּ‎</span>); [[2Kgs.9.16|2Kgs 9:16]]; [[2Kgs.9.23|2Kgs 9:23]]; [[2Kgs.9.27|2Kgs 9:27]]; [[2Kgs.9.29|2Kgs 9:29]]; [[2Kgs.11.2|2Kgs 11:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַזְיָה‎</span>). 

**3.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחְזַי‎</span> a priest [[Neh.11.13|Neh 11:13]] (for which <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְזֵרָה‎</span> [[1Chr.9.12|1Chr 9:12]] see [[BDB#Sm|Sm]]<sup>Listen, Tafel</sup>).
